snippet: Agents from Immigration and Customs Enforcement and the local authorities in 179 cities arrested 638 people over a monthlong period in March and April.
abstract: More than 600 suspected gang members are arrested in Homeland Security Dept's latest crackdown on street gangs, part of a larger Immigration and Customs Enforcement initiative that started in 2005 to target street gangs with international ties.
lead_paragraph: Agents from Immigration and Customs Enforcement and the local authorities in 179 cities arrested 638 people over a monthlong period in March and April.

headline.main: Over 600 Held in Crackdown on Gangs
headline.print_headline: Over 600 Held in Crackdown on Gangs
